name: Claude Bio Research
description: An agent that uses Anthropic's bio research knowledge work plugin
long_description: An agent that uses Anthropic's bio research knowledge work plugin. It defines 1 runtime agent configuration(s): claude-bio-research (ChatBot). The run command targets model configuration(s) including scvi`, scvi. The workflow is shaped by 1 rule file(s) (start.md) and 5 skill directory reference(s) (instrument-data-to-allotrope, nextflow-development, scientific-problem-selection, scvi-tools, single-cell-rna-qc). The bundle includes 1 embedded command doc(s) and 47 embedded skill file(s) from the knowledge-work-plugins package. It is configured to run on image reference(s): us-central1-docker.pkg.dev/meshagent-life/meshagent-public/cli:{SERVER_VERSION}-esgz.
